changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE mocks ( id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 ), route text NOT NULL, method_id integer NOT NULL, response_content_type_id integer NOT NULL, status_code integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 200, query_params text, textual_response_id integer, binary_response_id integer, created_at date NOT NULL, updated_at date, deleted_at date, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT http_method_fk FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT response_content_type_fk FOREIGN KEY (response_content_type_id) REFERENCES response_content_types (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT textual_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (textual_response_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT binary_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (binary_response_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID );
